snippet: A week after Andrew Ross Sorkin and Dov Seidman started “Apology Watch,” a highly publicized case study arrived in the form of Tim Armstrong, chief executive of AOL. | Bitcoin has had some particularly tough challenges in the last week or so. |...
abstract: A week after Andrew Ross Sorkin and Dov Seidman started “Apology Watch,” a highly publicized case study arrived in the form of Tim Armstrong, chief executive of AOL. | Bitcoin has had some particularly tough challenges in the last week or so. | The S.E.C. is on a losing streak, shedding light on the agency. | Janet L. Yellen, the chairwoman of the Federal Reserve, has a big week ahead.
